Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides expressed in medicinal maggots of the blow fly Lucilia sericata show combinatorial activity against bacteria.
Literature.Author: Pöppel AK, Vogel H, Wiesner J, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D31(MIC=7.0µM),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC=>100µM),Morganella morganii SG464(no activity data),Serratia marcescens SG621(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa K799/61(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa SG137(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa NCTC 10701(no activity data),Proteus mirabilis SG654(no activity data),Enterococcus faecalis 1528(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 511(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus 134/39(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis 987(no activity data),Penicillium chrysogenum JP36(no activity data),Candida albicans(no activity data)
